text:
"Quality...you know what it is, yet you don’t know what it is. But that’s self-contradictory. But some things are better than others, that is, they have more quality."

Robert Pirsig, author of Zen and the Art of Motorcycle Maintenance, comparing $CHTR to $ATUS
author: Gary

text: “Frankly fixed wireless is not a competitive offering against fiber or, for that matter, even Tier 1 cable. Where it works is on the fringe.” $bce.to $chtr $tmus $cmcsa
author: Pythia (Gay)
